definition.name: Azure Load Testing
definition.description: Automate continous regression testing with Azure Load Testing
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: loadtestConfigFile
inputs.description: Path of the YAML file. Should be fully qualified path or relative to the default working directory

inputs.name: loadtestResource
inputs.description: Enter or Select the name of an existing Azure Load Testing resource

inputs.name: loadtestRunName
inputs.description: Custom name for the load test run

inputs.name: loadtestRunDescription
inputs.description: Custom description for the load test run

inputs.name: resourceGroup
inputs.description: Enter or Select the Azure Resource Group that contains the Load test resource specified above

inputs.name: overrideParameters
inputs.description: Override parameters in the YAML config file using the JSON format with testId, displayName, description, engineInstances, autoStop supported.

inputs.name: outputVariableName
inputs.description: Name of the output variable that stores the test run ID for use in subsequent tasks.
